text: Eugene Cyril "Geno" Smith III (born October 10, 1990) is an American football quarterback for the Seattle Seahawks of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at West Virginia, leading the Mountaineers to multiple bowl games, breaking numerous passing records, and garnering multiple awards before getting drafted by the New York Jets in the second round of the 2013 NFL Draft. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Los Angeles Chargers players Category:New York Giants players Category:New York Jets players Category:Seattle Seahawks players
title: Geno Smith
